title: Tech Mahindra sheds 4% as IT major’s Q3 misses estimates - Economic Times
content: Tech Mahindra sheds 4% as IT major’s Q3 misses estimates  Economic Times
description: Tech Mahindra on Tuesday said its consolidated profit after tax (PAT) rose 4.5 per cent year-on-year (YoY) to Rs 1,368.50 crore compared with Rs 1,309.80 crore in the same quarter last year. Sequentially, the profit was up 2.2 per cent, the IT firm said in a BSE filing.
